text: The Godmakers may refer to: * The God Makers (film), a 1982 anti-Mormon film produced by Ed Decker, or the book of the same title by Decker and Dave Hunt ** The God Makers II, the film's sequel, or the book of the same title * The Godmakers (novel), a 1972 science fiction novel by Frank Herbert * Godmakers, an album by The Red Death
title: The Godmakers
